short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify the validty of digital media, powered by AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that provides all the information you need to determine what’s true or not without leaving the place where you consume your news. Aletheia not only provides convenient fact-checking, but also context around whatever you’re reading.
